name: JDOInstruments - Java OODBMS
short_description: "JDOInstruments" is programmed in JAVA. It is an Object-Oriented Database ( OODB / OODBMS )that implements JDO1.0.1 specification. It is integrated with Netbeans IDE (via Plugin module) allowing developers to build pure object-oriented systems.
